overview: Matt Stoen is a private equity manager. He has overseen the construction and development of projects across the country. He has structured the financing of Hotels, Restaurants, Golf Courses, and Master Planned communities. His debt and structured finance background affords him the opportunity to provide unique insurance assets to some of the largest institutions in Europe. Matt Stoen is a scratch golfer and regularly competes in amateur tournaments with the intention of one day making a run at the pro circuit. Matthew has two wonder boys, Ford David (3) and Fletcher Gray (2) along with his lovely wife, Mrs. Hayley E. Stoen.
